desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force cautiously heads toward the Abydos Desert.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force cautiously heads toward the Abydos Desert.
desc.thai: The Foreclosure Task Force cautiously heads toward the Abydos Desert.
desc.ko: The Foreclosure Task Force cautiously heads toward the Abydos Desert.
desc.zh_tw: 對策委員會小心翼翼地前往阿拜多斯沙漠。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 对策委员会小心翼翼地前往阿拜多斯沙漠。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 对策委员会小心翼翼地前往阿拜多斯沙漠。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 对策委员会小心翼翼地前往阿拜多斯沙漠。

desc.en: Everyone arrives at the edge of the desert. Since the train is unable to go any further, everyone starts walking. Serika wonders why the head of the Prefect Team would be the one who told Sensei, and Ayane reviews the situation back then.
desc.jp: Everyone arrives at the edge of the desert. Since the train is unable to go any further, everyone starts walking. Serika wonders why the head of the Prefect Team would be the one who told Sensei, and Ayane reviews the situation back then.
desc.thai: Everyone arrives at the edge of the desert. Since the train is unable to go any further, everyone starts walking. Serika wonders why the head of the Prefect Team would be the one who told Sensei, and Ayane reviews the situation back then.
desc.ko: Everyone arrives at the edge of the desert. Since the train is unable to go any further, everyone starts walking. Serika wonders why the head of the Prefect Team would be the one who told Sensei, and Ayane reviews the situation back then.
desc.zh_tw: 众人到达了沙漠边缘。由于电车无法继续前行，众人开始徒步前往。茜香对为什么是風紀委員會长告诉老师的，而綾音则回顾了当时的情况。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人到达了沙漠边缘。由于电车无法继续前行，众人开始徒步前往。芹香对为什么是风纪委员会长告诉老师的，而绫音则回顾了当时的情况。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 众人到达了沙漠边缘。由于电车无法继续前行，众人开始徒步前往。茜香对为什么是风纪委员会长告诉老师的，而绫音则回顾了当时的情况。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 众人到达了沙漠边缘。由于电车无法继续前行，众人开始徒步前往。芹香对为什么是风纪委员会长告诉老师的，而绫音则回顾了当时的情况。
